jobs.title: Software Engineer
description: Revised and optimized 10+ REST/GraphQL APIs and microservices, creating a centralized access point for efficient data collection from external partners
Upgraded and modernized 8+ architect APIs to latest Spring Boot and Java 17, ensuring seamless integration with our internal systems
Achieved an 80% improvement in data retrieval efficiency by enhancing database query performance and implementing secure database connections to meet HIPAA compliance
Implemented enhancements that resulted in a 50% reduction in response time, addressing and resolving bottlenecks in two critical queries, thereby improving overall system performance
Incorporated a notional savings account product into the healthcare system by developing new features to address product gaps and meet business requirements using Spring Framework and Java 7

Revamped QA testing process by executing in-depth analysis on the existing codebase, subsequently creating detailed documentation for ongoing development, resulting in a 40% decrease in bug resolution time and a 25% increase in overall software quality

Designed user interfaces for an internal project management web app using React, React Hooks, Material-UI, Bootstrap, and Spring Boot; redesigned project request workflow for external stakeholders, leading to a 40% increase in on-time project delivery

jobs.title: Software Verification Engineer
description: Designed 5+ test cases to ensure EnsiteX Electrophysiology software adheres to FDA and ISO standards for medical devices

Overhauled product requirements for efficiency, conducted user workflow simulations, and verified software design adherence to industry standards; increased software usability by 40% and reduced development time by 25%
Formulated procedures, configured tools, and executed Python scripts to perform dry run testing, regression testing and formal verification activities
Collaborated with development teams to resolve 30+ software defects in collaboration with development teams, submitting a JIRA issue and reported testing results in PTC

jobs.title: Data Engineering Intern
description: Mastered Rust programming, AWS Comprehend & Textract, and other relevant tech skills for a comprehensive understanding and researched diverse programs comprehensively to seamlessly align them with project requirements
Developed, troubleshot, and compiled code for various projects, consistently meeting both project specifications and adhering to company standards

jobs.company: University of Minnesota - Twin Cities; Dental IT
jobs.title: Student Tech Support Services
description: Troubleshooting and repairing software and hardware with roughly 100 clients per week via phone, email, and face to face interaction
Conveying solutions to clients in verbal and written form to solve current technology problems and prevent further issues
Compile, organize, and file over 800 Protected Health Information per week to reduce time and allow files to be easily accessible to practitioners

jobs.title: Analytical Engineering Intern
description: Completed tasks and workload for developers and directed communication for problem resolution
Supported Data Architect and Systems Administration team by resolving over 30 ticket requests per week
Compiled, organized, and documented over 300 types of files and dashboards to enforce proper protocols
Operated and managed around 5-10 promotions of Subject Area Marts per week
Troubleshooted data mart failures and communicated issues to appropriate owners
